main(String[]) - Static method in class pl.polsl.main.Main
The main method activates the controller and thus starts the program
Main - Class in pl.polsl.main
Main class You can provide a filename in the project run arguments, for example "grades.txt" Schema in file looks like: "(string)subject name": "(double)grade value"-"grade weight",...
Main() - Constructor for class pl.polsl.main.Main
 
menu() - Method in class pl.polsl.controller.Controller
Menu method with options: 1 - display grades 2 - display average 3 - display all subjects 4 - display not passing subjects 5 - display final grade 6 - exit If exceptions were found, the menu is not displaying
